task_text: What is the primary contact email on proj_helvetic_cleanroom_coatings

text_blocks: I can see that the current user is in the "External" department. According to the rules, External users cannot access customer contact information (emails/phones). Let me verify this is a real project and check what information I can provide.

project.name: Cleanroom-compatible coating package
project.description: Coating package for Helvetic FoodTech equipment and adjacent cleanroom surfaces.

text_blocks: The project exists and has a customer associated with it (cust_helvetic_foodtech). However, as an External department user, I cannot access customer contact emails/phones. I must deny this request.

input.message: Access denied. As an external user, you do not have permission to access customer contact information such as email addresses. Please contact your Bellini Coatings liaison for this information.

summary: denied_security: Access denied. As an external user, you do not have permission to access customer contact informatio
